content: I need to create a Jira issue for the Da Vinci Alerts IG ballot http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-alerts/2020FEB/index.html but I don't see anything like "US Da Vinci Alerts" listed in the Specification drop down list box. Do we need to add it or should I pick another choice?
try "Da Vinci Unsolicited Notifications IG" I haven't master the filtering in Jira yet but this is its title....
Its not there. @Lloyd McKenzie can you add "Da Vinci Unsolicited Notifications (aka Alerts)" to the list of specifications?
@Nick Radov you can always just add to a ballot spreadsheet (assuming you are signed up)
